title: Drawing, "Study. A mule", 1872–75
medium: Pencil. Brush, gouache.  Dark purple paper
inscribed: Written in ink, at right: "Ear length from eye to end nose/Eye in middle between top knot and nostril/Head length foreleg and line of billy."
description: Horizontal rectangle.  Shown in profile standing and turned toward right.  Part of the head shown obliquely from right is sketched in pencil, top right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study. A mule", 1872–75.
1872–75. Pencil. Brush, gouache.  Dark purple paper. Gift of Mrs. Samuel Colman. 1939-85-8.
